article_title: What to expect when you're expecting the president
article_text: During his stay, the president is always protected by "three rings of security," Robinson said. There are the agents closest to him, more scattered in a range of outer posts, and then the local and state police. "Anybody that would want to get to the president is going to have to go through some serious guys with guns," Robinson said.

article_metadata.description: Signs of the complicated security protocols underlying President Barack Obama's visit have been popping up around the state for weeks. What happens behind the scenes to pull it off?

og.description: Signs of the complicated security protocols underlying President Barack Obama's visit have been popping up around the state for weeks. What happens behind the scenes to pull it off?
og.title: What to expect when you're expecting the president

article_summary:
During his stay, the president is always protected by "three rings of security," Robinson said.
"Anybody that would want to get to the president is going to have to go through some serious guys with guns," Robinson said.
There are the agents closest to him, more scattered in a range of outer posts, and then the local and state police.
